name: Super Power Ball
description:
Hello and welcome to my first game ever, Super Power Ball! Super Power Ball is a stamina-based 3D platformer where you'll be trying to guide a ball through gaps, collect flowers, all while trying to maintain your stamina at the same time. Reach the yellow goal platform to advance to the next level. This game is still in its early stages and I look forward to you all enjoying it and the feedback for subsequent iterations of Super Power Ball in the future!

Future updates at https://youtube.com/teetektrab or follow me on itch.io!

 Thank you for your support and I hope you enjoy!

- The ball constantly constantly forward

-Keep the Green Bar LIT!

-Collect the Flowers!

-Reach the Yellow Goal Platform!

Controls:

Keyboard based:

A to go left

D to go right

J to fly
